mapper.select: SELECT station.sid, station.sname, station.direction, station.lno, station.info, station.addr, station.stel FROM station, bookmark WHERE mid=#{mid} AND station.sid = bookmark.sid
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookmark WHERE mid=#{mid} AND sid=#{sid}
mapper.select: SELECT history.sid AS sid, station.sname AS sname FROM history, station WHERE history.sid=station.sid AND history.mid=#{mid} ORDER BY history.hdate
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM history WHERE mid=#{mid} AND sid=#{sid}
